thought: To craft a netherite_ingot, I need to craft 4 gold_ingots. To craft a gold_ingot, I need to smelt a gold_ore. Therefore, I will smelt a gold_ore from slot 27 into slot 11.
Ok
act: smelt from slot 27 to slot 11 with quantity 1
